item.title: The !k'anni is an ornament worn by men and women
item.summary: The !k'anni is an ornament worn by men and women. |han≠kass'o says they are beautiful and look like things from the sea.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-25
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
